mapper.insert: insert into GQPTZ_WLXCSB (GQPBH, GQPMC, SCSJ, HSL, TRMD, ZJL, NMCJ, BXML, BSB, DJCZLBZZ, ZD, YSML, KYQD, STXS, JDMCXS, RHXS, JGMNJL, JGMNMCJ, CMNJL, CMNMCJ ) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nmcj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bxml,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djczlbzz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ysml,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kyqd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stxs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jdmcxs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{rhxs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jgmnjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jgmnmcj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cmnjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{cmnmcj,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update: update GQPTZ_WLXCSB set SCSJ = #{scsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HSL = #{hsl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRMD = #{trmd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJL = #{zjl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NMCJ = #{nmcj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BXML = #{bxml,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BSB = #{bsb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DJCZLBZZ = #{djczlbzz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZD = #{zd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, YSML = #{ysml,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KYQD = #{kyqd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STXS = #{stxs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, JDMCXS = #{jdmcxs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RHXS = #{rhxs,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, JGMNJL = #{jgmnjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, JGMNMCJ = #{jgmnmcj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CMNJL = #{cmnjl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CMNMCJ = #{cmnmcj,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where GQPBH = #{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and GQPMC = #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GQPBH, GQPMC, SCSJ, HSL, TRMD, ZJL, NMCJ, BXML, BSB, DJCZLBZZ, ZD, YSML, KYQD, STXS, JDMCXS, RHXS, JGMNJL, JGMNMCJ, CMNJL, CMNMCJ from GQPTZ_WLXCSB
